title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Joy Taylor steps in to give her thoughts on the NBA Draft and the Magic's decision to make a surprise pick with Paolo Banchero out of Duke going first overall. She talks about Kyrie Irving's future as he is considering a move from the Brooklyn Nets and why the Lakers are not a great fit despite previously winning a championship with LeBron James. She tells you why Baker Mayfield should no longer be considered a franchise quarterback despite interest from the Panthers and Seahawks. Plus, former NBA front office executive John Hollinger joins the show to explain why Chet Holmgren can succeed in today's NBA. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

She tells you why Baker Mayfield should no longer be considered a franchise quarterback despite interest from the Panthers and Seahawks. Plus, former NBA front office executive John Hollinger joins the show to explain why Chet Holmgren can succeed in today's NBA.
